snippet.title: Gothic 1 Remake | Welcome to the Old Camp | Showcase Trailer 2023
snippet.description:
Welcome to the Old Camp in the Valley of Mines. Take a stroll through the camp, meet friendly locals, or go sightseeing. The Arena is said to be especially lovely at this time of the year! 

Gothic 1 Remake is coming to PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S. 

All footage captured in-engine. 


- Links & Info -  
Steam: https://thqn.net/g1r-steam 
Website: https://gothic-game.com 
Discord: https://discord.gg/gothic 

- Socials -  
YouTube: https://youtube.com/THQNordic  
Twitter: https://twitter.com/gothicthegame 
Facebook: https://facebook.com/THQNordic 
Instagram: https://instagram.com/thqnordic  
TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@thqnordic  
Twitch: https://twitch.tv/thqnordic  

#Gothic #ReturnToTheColony #THQNordic2023
